website_summaries.verdict: Good all-round collection of tools for everyday repair jobs and DIY around the house. The ideal starter set, or a great gift, at a very reasonable price.
pros: Each component of this well thought-out kit is properly useful in it’s own right
Having them all neatly stashed in a smart case is a bonus
Easy to use, easy to store
cons: It’s a shame the drill is only 8 volt
It will handle driving, and modest holes in drywall, but you’ll need more power if you want to tackle masonry

customer_reviews.title: Most of Toolkit fine, okay value. Measuring tape broken upon opening
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the toolkit has been great. The measuring tape, however, was not staying 'straight' or flat, even at 2 feet length. Right around the 4-inch mark it kept collapsing which made it frustrating to work with. When I called to complain with Amazon, Amazon offered to pay for a similar-length replacement measuring tape. It's usually easier to call into Amazon for an issue-resolve, but I don't know if Hi-Spec would have offered a similar seamless issue resolution. 3/5 stars for the product, and 5/5 stars for Amazon customer service, who always stands by products that are FBA or that they sell themselves.
customer_reviews.author: HelloMan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the House
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this toolbox is essential. you have your everyday necessities (screwdrivers, knife, tape, pliers, bits, drill) the drill isn't heavy duty but can still complete most household tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Husband is happy
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This made my husband SO happy. He has been wanting tools and especially a screwdriver for the longest. We tend to have a lot of house projects and been using one tool for it, it was annoying, but this was PERFECT. It came with just everything we need, the screwdriver is easy to use. The box cutter was kind of cheap though as it broke easily but other than that everything is awesome as pictured and the price for this was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Missing assumptions
customer_reviews.text: You would think a kit like this would include pliers, adjustable wrench, and maybe Allen keys, but it does not. So remember to buy them separately if you are after a complete basic set. Otherwise, quality acceptable. Case latch is good. Drill very lightweight but nothing more expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST cordless drill I ever invested in
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful not heavy at all like my contractors and Comes with additional tools I never thought I would use. Great great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a bit on the cheaper side & you get what you pay for. The drill is a bit smaller than what I’d like but it’s not bad for home projects. I don’t like the case for the tools. It’s a bit to weak but other than that, I got what I was expecting. If you’re going to be using the drill a lot & that’s why you’re considering purchasing this I’d recommend you keep looking due to the fact that it’s rather smaller & weak.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Complete set
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bad boy for a while now and I use it all the time. For the value, it's an amazing kit. Proud to own this.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Everything’s great with this product. Only thing is to make sure to close it with the drill side on the bottom since it doesn’t latch on like the other tools. Also, I was hoping the top of the drill would be magnetic so I could attach a magnetic leveler.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A very nice tool box good price as well
customer_reviews.text: Such a good tool box perfect Price, perfect size great for household repairs
customer_reviews.author: A . T .

customer_reviews.title: It really comes through !
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this ALL the time because we just moved into a new house with lots of projects. And this tool set has helped him knock these projects off the list.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O'Neal Donnan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Honey loved it for Christmas. We needed house tools and these are perfect! No more going to his parents house when we need a drill 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: JhMeSI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 99.9% of us
customer_reviews.text: I won't be building any houses with these tools, but if you need a small, efficient, well-stocked tool box for hanging pictures, assembling the occasional furniture or other general household tasks this set checks all of the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: bling

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This item came the next day after ordering which was a surprise! Really love it. I keep doing DIY projects around the house with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Shellean

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE THIS IS A PIECE OF JUNK THE VERY FIRST TIME WE USED IT TO HANG BRACKETS FOR A CURTAIN, ONE OF THE BIT BROKE AND HE SCREW DRIVER BITS JUST STRIP THE SCREWS WILL BE RETURNING THIS ITEM!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment, my first toolbox and it works like a charm. Very , very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My item came faster than expected. And it had more stuff in it than I thought it would have. It was a good buy & worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband for Father’s Day and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia J

customer_reviews.title: Weak, broken drill bit, short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Drill bit broke after first use. I was just drilling into Dry wall nothing crazy. Very weak drill and battery dies fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most important is how do I pack drill is not too big
customer_reviews.text: I like how everything came in a box I'll buy in the box before where everything wasn't included so I'm very happy and all the tools is so handy to use
customer_reviews.author: Deremiah Demaih

product_meta.title: Hi-Spec 26 Piece Household Tool Kit Including 8V Cordless Drill Driver with 1300 mAh Li-Ion Rechargeable 16 Position Keyless Torque Clutch, Variable Speed Switch, Accessory Set & 25pc Hand Tools
feature_bullets: TIME SAVING: Designed with power, performance and flexibility in mind the cordless drill driver is great for hanging pictures, putting up shelves, drilling holes in wood, and tightening and loosening the screws found in metal, wood and plastic. With no cumbersome cords to tangle or get in the way this drill offers optimal mobility and handling for DIY household repairs

PERFORMANCE The twin-sleeve keyless chuck allows for easy one-handed changing of screwdriver and drill bits. The trigger speed switch allows for smooth pilot drilling followed by rapid drilling at full speed, while the 16-position torque selector provides control over a range of delicate to powerful screw and drill driving applications

LITHIUM-ION TECHNOLOGY: This 8V 1300mAh Li-Ion Cordless Screwdriver has a powerful 13 Nm of forward and reverse turning torque for drilling holes, and tightening and loosening screws. The rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery charges in 3 to 5 hours and is capable of a large number of charging and discharging cycles making this this a practical time saving addition to any home

COMBO DRILL DRIVER KIT: Includes the 10 most commonly found sized household screwdriver bits, a 50mm magnetic bit holder when extra reach is required, and 5 High Grade Steel Carpentry Wood Drill Bits (3, 4, 5, 6, 8mm) for drilling in wood and carpentry projects
HI-SPEC POWER TOOL 3 YEAR QUALITY GUARANTEE: Satisfaction assured on this Cordless Drill and US Approved 2 Pin Recharger with an Hi-Spec Hand Tools lifetime quality warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
